dialogues.speaker: FADE IN
dialogues.text: to find a dejected COCO leading her suitcases in a cab .. climbing in ... addressing the driver ... coco L.A.X.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as COCO looks out at Los Angeles ... returning home and . she stops looking just as ... the cab passes a ROADSIDE S on a busy street and CUT TO

dialogues.speaker: WE
dialogues.text: stay with the ROADSIDE STAND ... see several HOMELESS PEO unloading the CRATES taken from the back of ERYSON’S pick-up ... FILLED with DEASE ART ... HANGING pieces on a fence as ... A CAR stops and a COUPLE get out ... regard the art ...

dialogues.speaker: WOMAN
dialogues.text: Oh that’s lovely. How much is it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the DEASE ... STUNNING LAKE OF CONSTANCE FILLING FRAME as

dialogues.speaker: MORE PASSERSBY
dialogues.text: begin to stop ... regard the MYRIAD PIECES OF DEASE ART . pulling wallets ... carrying them off and THAT’S IT
